## DynamicLoggerFactory.get() method

Returns a logger that is instantiated lazily (and potentially) multiple times.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get(): Observable<LoggerFactory>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Observable<LoggerFactory>`

observable of the logger factory
